title: Tray configuration file
description: A schema file that describes the config-tray.json used for initializing the Tray application.

port.title: Port
port.description: The port on which the Tray should listen for incoming connections

secret.title: Secret
secret.description: A secret message that C-Troll has to end along with every message to ensure that only authorized C-Troll applications are allowed to talk to this Tray. Providing an empty string is the same as not providing this key.

showWindow.title: Show Window
showWindow.description: Determines whether the main window of the Tray application should be shown on startup or if the application should minimize to the system tray immediately

logFile.title: Log File
logFile.description: Determines whether C-Troll should write the log messages to a file or not

logRotation.title: Log Rotation
logRotation.description: Contains information about whether a log rotation should be performed and in which intervals.

frequency.title: Rotation Frequency
frequency.description: The frequency in which the log rotation should be performed, provided in hours

keepPrevious.title: Should keep previous file
keepPrevious.description: Determines whether the previous log file should be kept after the rotation or deleted
